summary: Stand up comedian and marijuana user Doug Benson documents thirty days of pot free living and thirty days of non-stop use to compare the effects of both.
cast: Brian Unger|Gary Cohan|Robert Gore|Sean Tabibian|Paul F. Tompkins|Bob Odenkirk|Graham Elwood|Jimmy Dore|Greg Proops|Rob Huebel|Rob Riggle|Brian Posehn|Patton Oswalt|Sarah Silverman|Arj Barker|Zach Galifianakis|Calvin Frye|Don Duncan|James Underdown|Marc Emery|Dana Gould|Craig X. Rubin|Joe Escalante|John Marty|Darrell Paulsen|Missy Narrance|Richard Lee|Andrew Glazier|Dennis Peron|Jeffrey Prang|John Smith|Doug Benson|Andrew Almanza|Amit Itelman|John Marty|Ian Roberts|Jeffrey Ross|Lynnette Shaw|Alex Campbell|Dave Navarro
title: Super High Me
